accomplishments.features: Implements text-based file reading with safety checks for FileReader events.
Token estimation (4 chars/token), conversation analysis, and context threshold logic.
Visual UI indicator for token utilization percentage and remaining context.
Integration with ContextManager service and custom event dispatching via globalThis.

troubleshooting_history.description: Unable to load local modules due to missing file extensions.
troubleshooting_history.resolution: Appended explicit .ts and .jsx extensions to all relative imports to satisfy Deno requirements.

troubleshooting_history.description: Object is possibly 'null' error on FileReader event target.
troubleshooting_history.resolution: Implemented guard clause 'if (!e.target) return' before accessing result property.

troubleshooting_history.description: lastMsg is possibly 'undefined' when updating messages array.
troubleshooting_history.resolution: Added defensive check 'if (!lastMsg) return prev' inside the setMessages functional update.

troubleshooting_history.description: exactOptionalPropertyTypes error when assigning 'undefined' to optional properties like 'model'.
troubleshooting_history.resolution: Switched to spread operator '...lastMsg' to preserve property omission and used nullish coalescing (??) for the timestamp.

current_status: All core compiler errors in ChatInterface.tsx, FileUpload.tsx, and useContextManager.ts are resolved. The system is ready for streaming integration testing.
